data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Manatí, Puerto Rico, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Manatí, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Manatí, Puerto Rico into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: There are 37,300 people living in the state of Manatí. Only about 12,127 might be believers.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Manatí, Puerto Rico to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Manatí
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Manatí, Manatí, Puerto Rico.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Manatí to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Manatí
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary:
the state of Manatí, Puerto Rico has a population of 37,300.

We estimate Manatí has 12,127 people who might know Jesus, 23,139 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,034 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Manatí, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
